9.17.20  2:29 am   when it was the first day of school and you thought you might quit, what type of things did you pack before you walked through the door?

      i thought that story was about you

9.17.20  2:00 am   You've told tales of the 13 levels of suffering, and how after the 13th you are informed of another level. Wouldn't there be 14 levels of suffering?

     at least

     Does not knowing of the 14th level add more suffering to the process?

     when you arrive at the 15th, you will be pleased to find out that you have never suffered at all

9.17.20  1:56 am   Thoughts on Saturn 

      very big planet. not the biggest, but besides the biggest it is biggest. biggest non biggest planet

9.17.20  1:31 am   Did you know that Ohio doesn't exist?

     that is difficult for me to believe because i've been there

     Have you ever met anyone from Ohio?

     yes

      Didn't think so. Stay woke ;)

9.17.20  12:57 am   O my Glob.
Outside of something I can't remember from "Seymour: An Introduction," this is one of the most profound ¿philosphlets? on music I've ever:
" as soon as you start thinking of it as a 'chord progression' you'll lose 95% of the effectiveness of chords, for songs. just write songs, and use chords to get it done "
- ueqestion:   Is something similar true for "voicings," as you work through them?

     if 'voicings' means 'multiple notes at the same time' then absolutely yes

        IE, does any given chord "grow itself" though internal relationships with it's neighborhood?

     i would say so

9.17.20  12:44 am   where do you stand on the issue?

      on the ground

9.16.20  11:51 pm   Does drinking water make you smarter? 

      no, but it makes you stronger, and strong people are smart

9.16.20  11:37 pm   What should I do if I feel like my song goes on for too long but I like every individual part of the song? 

      find the 'split point.' run the song from the beginning and find the first part that really doesn't seem good enough. just before that part, this is the 'split point.' take away everything after that (save it, put it on a shelf, don't promise to use it for this). keep running it from the beginning up to the split point and try to figure out what comes next, with no bias toward what you've shelved. although if the shelved contents screams out to you as the perfect thing for the moment immediately after the split point, then you can use it. but always respect the play through from the beginning, and know the split point

9.16.20  11:28 pm   occasionally i perceive your songs as being sung by multiple people, in the story of the song. as in this verse is about and sung by this g, the next verse is about and sung by this other guy, the first chorus is this guy, etc. do you have any thoughts on this

      that seems good

9.16.20  11:27 pm   will the bill wurtz band continue to make appearances in some of your music videos in the future?

      of course

9.16.20  10:46 pm   are you god

      i thought you were

9.16.20  10:37 pm   How do you eat a muffin

      impossible. it can't be done

9.16.20  10:30 pm   9.16.20  12:24 pm was this a total drama island reference

      was thinking 'survivor'

9.16.20  9:18 pm   at what point do you think we will be able to harness energy from the galaxy

      everyone is already doing it

9.16.20  8:42 pm   What are your thoughts on music?

      it is a highly customizable feels enhancer. if you present a lemon, coupled with exactly the right tailor made music, the feels of the lemon can go to upwards of 50,000,000 times their original base feel. is it the music we're feeling? technically yes, but the feelings are being anchored into a tangible mental space: the lemon. the music is enhancing and shaping the feels of the lemon. with no lemon, the music will not know which feels to enhance

9.16.20  8:32 pm   When are you going to release your next song/when are you going to finish it?

     i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

      There are some rumors that you are learning 3D animation so I also want to know how that's going:)

     i had some huge dreams and goals, and after letting my imagination run wild for way too long (and surely developing some much needed techniques methods), it is now time to religiously obey the orders of the simplicity police, to ensure my actual existence. it's early 2014 all over again

9.16.20  8:23 pm   Is there a deeper meaning behind frogs?

      deeper than what

9.16.20  7:43 pm   i can't remember when but i know that somewhere you said you love the word "reasonable" but when i ctrl+f the word in the lyrics page, there's only one. why?

      because, as you may have just noticed, another thing i love is RESTRAINT AND MODERATION

9.16.20  7:32 pm   What was your inspiration for ball and stick?

      they just look phenomenal in the frame together. any excuse to put those 2 together

9.16.20  6:50 pm   i've been asking around, but i still can't seem to find out what the heck a dolphin is. do you know?

      an extremely wet dog. if you don't believe me, then you just haven't seen a dog wet enough. but you actually have, and it's called a dolphin

9.16.20  6:44 pm   HELP MY CAPS LOCK HAS BROKE

      i want to believe you

9.16.20  6:25 pm   When do you think you'll be done with your next video?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.16.20  6:16 pm   What is the pitch of the first note in your next music video?

      B, although technically this is supported by some type of E minor chord so there are technically other notes at the exact same time but the most obvious note is the melody and vocal note which is B

9.16.20  4:37 pm   i'm starting guitar lessions today any advice

      figure out whether you are the student or the teacher

9.16.20  4:03 pm   why does my brain not allow me to do things in a timely manner?

      because each thing is too interesting and enjoyable

9.16.20  4:00 pm   are you a ghost

      no but i am the next best thing

9.16.20  3:49 pm   when's the autobiography coming out?

      it's released gradually over the course of many years

9.16.20  3:34 pm   What lines/jokes did you reluctantly cut out of HOTEWIG? And please tell me that you didn't fall for the rickroll below

      the vikings invade england, interrupting the previous invaders from interrupting the previous invaders. then alfred invades back (871) ('great' job alfred)
     
     the king of england and the king of france both want to be the king of france, so they fight about it for 100 years, fuck it, maybe more. they almost didn't even notice the black death (show world population)
     
     
     here's the delhi sultanate, taking over all of india (er, most of india)
     
     tired of high spice prices? "hell yeah" said portugal. cut out the middle man. hell, cut out as many middle man's as you can!
     
     then his grandson eventually takes over (Ashoka), and he turns out to be the nicest guy Ever, and he makes roads and healthcare, and adopts Buddhism. and he doesn't even like violence
     
     and they are taking over the world ! (Indo-Europeans) very gradually , . . er, at a medium pace, and pretty soon they will be all over europe, and india! and then their name will make sense, but it won't be their name any more.
     

           BY THE WAY,there is another major center of civilization in South America, and it's been here the entire time. they've got pyrimids. (pause) don't tell anyone
     
     
     and there are 4 locations where you can Farm Harder than anywhere else. here, here, here, and here. why? Fat Dank River Valleys. you can farm til the cows come home
     
     
     LEVEL UP !!!!!!!!! NEW TRICK: try hitting a rock.. with another rock.. to make a.. slightly sharper rock
     
     new trick: try making strange and unique sounds with your mouth, to symbolize thoughts and feelings
     
     
     
     side effect: u will poop oxygen
     
     
     OXYGEN ALERT: now there is oxygen everywhere, and it's making "rust clumps" (what are rust clumps?) clumps of rust! and they fall to the floor.   (silence)  could come in handy later.
     by the way, oxygen is poisonous, and everything is dead now.
     ,.... except for the hipsters who made it. .... and some post-hipsters, who have actually learned how to Breathe it
     
     
      a lamp
      a fax
     the perfect screw
      planes
      flying planes
      a sweet benz
      a photograph
      a telephone
      a telegraph
      a phonograph
      a graphophone
      nerds, that know how to use the shit
     
     
     
     now computers are even faster, smarter, smaller, and prettier. knowledge and data are more interconnected than ever before. now you can revceive great product offers on the inside of your eyelids, specifically catered to your interests based on an aggregated analysis of your behavior, thoughts, and feelings.
     
     
     
     congratulations vietnam,  on having your own brand new country, which happens to be communist.  "What?" (show US rushing in)
     
     
     
     
     united states is dumping money into japan, and western europe, as a friendly token of "please don't become communist"
      and the sov union is dumping money into eastern europe as a friendly token of "please don't become capitalist"
     
     
     
     
     united states finally gave up trying to keep vietnam un-communist, so they leave, bombing cambodia on the way out.
     
     
     
     
      'let's save the planet' said everybody, not knowing how.
      is this ok? is everything ok?
      why am i a talking animal?
      does time travel?
      is there,
      what did-
      hi, i'm a
     [end]

9.16.20  3:27 pm   Where did you learn to make those sweet jazzy melodies

      at home, and in the workplace

9.16.20  2:46 pm   should people have the ability to speak

      sure

9.16.20  2:16 pm   how will the world end

      by starting again and again repeatedly

9.16.20  2:15 pm   Hey bill, why isn't there a c flat or b sharp key on a piano. If there was one idk how i would find c but I feel like it could still work somehow. 

      there is no satisfactory explanation i can give you. you'll have to try to set this up yourself, and then you will be faced with answering a series of other questions, such as what should the pitches be, and/or do all the other note names and pitches have to change, and how so. i think if you embark on such an experiment you will re-emerge into the world as a brand new person

9.16.20  2:14 pm   do you overthink

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.16.20  2:01 pm   What is love?

      it is the "yes" mode of life

9.16.20  1:48 pm   What is the third letter of your upcoming song?

      l

9.16.20  1:45 pm   when is the new song being released

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.16.20  1:41 pm   How do you not hate everything you make once you've made it?

     i do, a little

      Like every time I make something I hate it and delete it

      i've become aware that one of the core principles of the universe is that everything is hateable and terrible. especially the really good things

9.16.20  1:32 pm   Hey bill! Wondering this, what's the fourth word of the new song coming out gonna be?

      all

9.16.20  1:31 pm   hi bill nice video and im glad you didnt lie to me about the soap but i was wondering how often you completely rewrite songs.

     about 1 out of 50 songs

      how do you deal with musical ideas that you really want to work but just wont?

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

9.16.20  1:13 pm   Any tips on staying alive?

      move at a decisively inquisitive pace

9.16.20  1:12 pm   hi bill, please just be honest and tell me if you actually are making something.

      i am, but that's not as important as all the other things i will make after that

      i will do it when i get a chance
